name: Shield Knight (Antoine Foucault, AdamZbuub, NaoYu, Sorako-Kun, RedKeust, Horrenberger.Romain)
name_original: Shield Knight (Antoine Foucault, AdamZbuub, NaoYu, Sorako-Kun, RedKeust, Horrenberger.Romain)
description:
Story

Take control of the princess in this short but epic quest to deliver the captured knight. Thankfully, she's armed with the sword-shield, a powerful weapon that allows its user to shoot back enemy projectiles.

Will this be enough for her to manage to get to the top of the tower and save her love?

Controls

Controls available with both controller and keyboard!

Our team:

Game Programmer:

  •  Antoine Foucault

Game Artist:

  • Naomie Halter
  • Julien Dennemont
  • Adam Lenglen

Game Designer:

  • Léa-Maria Ambrosio
  • Romain Horrenberger
